title: Serifed Font used in Radiance ID?
author: Wyman Projects

comments.content:
Luxury Text Bold, by House Industries:

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140317/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts")

The sans serif may be FF Mark Office Medium:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/mark/offc-medium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140317/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/mark/offc-medium/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/mark/offc-medium/")

kthomps5, many thanks! I appreciate the quick reply!  
Cheers

You're welcome.

Here's a link to the UK firm that designed the logo:  
 [http://constructlondon.com/projects/radiance-cleanse-juice](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140317/http:/constructlondon.com/projects/radiance-cleanse-juice "http://constructlondon.com/projects/radiance-cleanse-juice")

Concurring with Kevin on Luxury Text Bold for the serif 'RADIANCE' with /E crossbar slightly modified (trapezoidal for Luxury Text, rectangular for your sample).  
For the sans, judging from some small details (/S curved shape, /A crossbar low position, /E stems equal width...), I'd probably go for [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140317/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova).
